objects.name: GameCréditos
objects.string:
Jogo Desenvolvido pelos alunos Arthur Rangel, Daniel Halfield
 e Diego Oliveira do curso de sistema de informações.

content.text:
Jogo Desenvolvido pelos alunos Arthur Rangel, Daniel Halfield
 e Diego Oliveira do curso de sistema de informações.

objects.name: GameObjetivo
objects.string: Corra o mais longe possível para vencer as fases, evitando os obstáculos gerados aleatoriamente que exigem que o jogador salte, coletando o máximo de moedas e power-ups possíveis para uma maior pontuação.

content.text: Corra o mais longe possível para vencer as fases, evitando os obstáculos gerados aleatoriamente que exigem que o jogador salte, coletando o máximo de moedas e power-ups possíveis para uma maior pontuação.

objects.name: GameControles
objects.string:
Espaço = Pula com o Personagem
Click Esquerdo Mouse = Pula com o Personagem
Touch da tela = Pula com o Personagem

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: PlatformerCharacterAnimator
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Change animations and horizontal flipping of a platformer character automatically.
description: Automatically change the animations and horizontal flipping of a platformer character based on movement and interaction with platform objects.
The platformer example uses this extension ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://platformer)).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Change animations and horizontal flipping of a platformer character automatically.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: PlatformerCharacterAnimator

events.name: Flip character based on input from controls
Flip character based on input from controls

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) automated animation changes a platformer character. Disabling animation changes is useful to play custom animations.
eventsFunctions.name: EnableChangingAnimations

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) automated horizontal flipping of a platform character.
eventsFunctions.name: EnableHorizontalFlipping

eventsFunctions.description: Set the "Idle" animation name. Do not use quotation marks.
eventsFunctions.name: SetIdleAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: Set the "Move" animation name. Do not use quotation marks.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMoveAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: Set the "Jump" animation name. Do not use quotation marks.
eventsFunctions.name: SetJumpAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: Set the "Fall" animation name. Do not use quotation marks.
eventsFunctions.name: SetFallAnimationName

eventsFunctions.description: Set the "Climb" animation name. Do not use quotation marks.
eventsFunctions.name: SetClimbAnimationName
